data.title: â˜… Ai Sugiyama Address
data.meta_description: Provides a mailing address for requesting autographs and sending fan mail to Ai Sugiyama
data.text:
Fan mail address:

Ai Sugiyama

Chiba Television Broadcasting Co., Ltd.

1-1-25 Miyakocho

Chuo Ward

Chiba, 260-0001

Japan

Not an updated address?

Please let us know! Address information:

Chiba Television Broadcasting Co., Ltd.

(TV Station)

1-1-25 Miyakocho

Chuo Ward

Chiba, 260-0001

Japan

Phone: +81 (0)433113100

Fax:

Official website

Note: View larger map

If you want to request an autograph, follow the guidelines bellow. If you just want to mail a letter with the address above, and do not want anything back, then you can stop reading! If you live in Japan send a properly stamped and self addressed envelope (minimum size 8.5" x 4") with your request letter and a photo. You can include a piece of cardboard to keep the photo from bending in shipping and also add "Do Not Bend" on the envelopes. Send your letter and wait. On average, there is going to be a 3+ month wait for a response. If you do not live in Japan, add several* International Reply Coupons. The International Reply Coupons (IRC) will be used by the receiver to purchase japanese stamps. You can only get them at your post office. Place the IRCs into the envelope, not on it. For more information on reply coupons click here. *For information on postage prices to receive a letter from Japan click here.
